title: Could not find artifacts  for Solidity tests (Windows only, v.5.0.0/1)
body:
- [ ] I've asked for help in the [Truffle Gitter](http://gitter.im/Consensys/truffle) before filing this issue.

---------------------------

## Issue

`truffle test` does not run on truffle v.5.0.0 and v5.0.1 on Windows 10 x64  using the truffle metacoin box as example. Used ganache as well as development networks to test. Error seems similar to issue #885 and #952 

## Steps to Reproduce

Get truffle metacoin example running,
start ganache-cli
run truffle compile, migrate, test 

truffle test will fail with truffle v.5.0.0 as well as v.5.0.1

see error logs under actual results section

## Expected Behavior

Everything worked fine with truffle v.4.1.15 with the same blockchain setup.

```
truffle test --network=ganache
      Using network 'ganache'.
      
      Compiling .\contracts\ConvertLib.sol...
      Compiling .\contracts\MetaCoin.sol...
      Compiling .\test\TestMetacoin.sol...
      Compiling truffle/Assert.sol...
      Compiling truffle/DeployedAddresses.sol...
      
      
        TestMetacoin
          √ testInitialBalanceUsingDeployedContract (47ms)
          √ testInitialBalanceWithNewMetaCoin (39ms)
      
        Contract: MetaCoin
          √ should put 10000 MetaCoin in the first account
          √ should call a function that depends on a linked library (55ms)
          √ should send coin correctly (65ms)
      
      
        5 passing (701ms)
```

## Actual Results

truffle test is broken on Windows 10 x64 with truffle v5.0.0 and v.5.0.1
**Error Log:** 

```
truffle test --network=ganache
Using network 'ganache'.

Compiling .\contracts\ConvertLib.sol...
Compiling .\test\TestMetacoin.sol...


  TestMetacoin
    1) "before all" hook: prepare suite

  Contract: MetaCoin
    √ should put 10000 MetaCoin in the first account
    √ should call a function that depends on a linked library
    √ should send coin correctly (115ms)


  3 passing (5s)
  1 failing

  1) TestMetacoin
       "before all" hook: prepare suite:
     Error: Could not find artifacts for \C\Users\D0J1B2\Desktop\Code\metacoin\contracts\ConvertLib.sol from any sources
      at Resolver.require (C:\Users\D0J1B2\AppData\Roaming\npm\node_modules\truffle\build\webpack:\packages\truffle-resolver\index.js:37:1)
      at TestResolver.require (C:\Users\D0J1B2\AppData\Roaming\npm\node_modules\truffle\build\webpack:\packages\truffle-core\lib\testing\testresolver.js:23:1)
      at TestResolver.require (C:\Users\D0J1B2\AppData\Roaming\npm\node_modules\truffle\build\webpack:\packages\truffle-core\lib\testing\testresolver.js:23:1)
      at dependency_paths.forEach.dependency_path (C:\Users\D0J1B2\AppData\Roaming\npm\node_modules\truffle\build\webpack:\packages\truffle-core\lib\testing\soliditytest.js:203:1)
      at Array.forEach (<anonymous>)
      at deployer.deploy.then (C:\Users\D0J1B2\AppData\Roaming\npm\node_modules\truffle\build\webpack:\packages\truffle-core\lib\testing\soliditytest.js:202:1)
      at C:\Users\D0J1B2\AppData\Roaming\npm\node_modules\truffle\build\webpack:\packages\truffle-deployer\src\deferredchain.js:20:1
      at <anonymous>
      at process._tickCallback (internal/process/next_tick.js:188:7)
```

## Environment

* Operating System: 
* Ethereum client: Ganache CLI v6.2.5 (ganache-core: 2.3.3)
* Truffle version (`truffle version`): v5.0.1 and v5.0.0
* node version (`node --version`): v8.11.2
* npm version (`npm --version`): 5.6.0

Same as on Ubuntu 16.04 
Truffle v5.0.1 (core: 5.0.1)
Node v9.11.2
 ```
Error: Could not find artifacts for ./ProductsTests.sol from any sources
    at Resolver.require (/home/adelin/.nvm/versions/node/v9.11.2/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/packages/truffle-resolver/index.js:37:1)
    at TestResolver.require (/home/adelin/.nvm/versions/node/v9.11.2/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/packages/truffle-core/lib/testing/testresolver.js:23:1)
    at /home/adelin/.nvm/versions/node/v9.11.2/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/packages/truffle-core/lib/test.js:102:1
    at Array.map (<anonymous>)
    at /home/adelin/.nvm/versions/node/v9.11.2/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/packages/truffle-core/lib/test.js:100:1
    at <anonymous>
    at process._tickCallback (internal/process/next_tick.js:182:7)
Truffle v5.0.1 (core: 5.0.1)
Node v9.11.2

```
Hmm we'll try and reproduce this error for the Metacoin box.
I just tried the Metacoin tests on Ubuntu 16.04 with Truffle v5.0.2 and they ran successfully. @AdelinGhanaem perhaps you have a different problem, is your code available somewhere?
Do you have the entire project on github?
I have the similiar issue on Windows 10 64-bit when running `truffle test`

I have this issue also on Win 10 x64 trying the pet shop tutorial.

`
Error: Could not find artifacts for \C\Dev\pet-shop-tutorial\contracts\Adoption.sol from any sources
      at Resolver.require (C:\Users\matt\AppData\Roaming\npm\node_modules\truffle\build\webpack:\packages\truffle-resolver\index.js:37:1)
      at TestResolver.require (C:\Users\matt\AppData\Roaming\npm\node_modules\truffle\build\webpack:\packages\truffle-core\lib\testing\testresolver.js:23:1)
      at TestResolver.require (C:\Users\matt\AppData\Roaming\npm\node_modules\truffle\build\webpack:\packages\truffle-core\lib\testing\testresolver.js:23:1)
      at dependency_paths.forEach.dependency_path (C:\Users\matt\AppData\Roaming\npm\node_modules\truffle\build\webpack:\packages\truffle-core\lib\testing\soliditytest.js:203:1)
      at Array.forEach (<anonymous>)
      at deployer.deploy.then (C:\Users\matt\AppData\Roaming\npm\node_modules\truffle\build\webpack:\packages\truffle-core\lib\testing\soliditytest.js:202:1)
      at C:\Users\matt\AppData\Roaming\npm\node_modules\truffle\build\webpack:\packages\truffle-deployer\src\deferredchain.js:20:1
      at process._tickCallback (internal/process/next_tick.js:68:7)
`
I have the same error as mattcowan on Win 10 x64 doing the pet shop tutorial
I had this same error on my Win 10 x64 PC, Truffle 5.0.2 while following the pet-shop tutorial

Same problem here.
System: Win 10 x64
Truffle:  5.0.1
Isn't this the same issue which was already solved in an earlier version? See [here](https://github.com/trufflesuite/truffle/issues/885)

However, everything is working as expected on a Jenkins which is installed on CentOS 7.

I hope this will be fixed in a future minor release.
I have the same issue with windows 10 64

Same issue here.
OS: Windows 10
Truffle: v5.0.3
Solidity: v0.5.0
Node: v8.11.1

I did a simple `truffle unbox metacoin` followed by `truffle test` which results in

```
 1) TestMetacoin
       "before all" hook: prepare suite:
     Error: Could not find artifacts for \E\source\repos\vsc\SmartContracts\truffleProject\contracts\ConvertLib.sol from any sources
```

Hey @Shadowstep33 you should totally open a PR. About your first point: GitHub makes it really easy! [Here](https://github.com/trufflesuite/truffle/blob/develop/packages/truffle-core/lib/testing/soliditytest.js) is the file you need to edit, just click this button: Your changes will get run through the automated tests, which should provide a base level of confidence that your solution works and doesn't break anything. Don't worry, we're all friends here! You went through all the trouble of figuring out this out. You should definitely receive the credit. Even if your approach isn't "kosher", it's an invaluable starting point for the discussion moving forward. Having an open pull request makes it so much easier to transfer knowledge about a solution, since you can see the changes side-by-side and have conversations about specific lines, etc. On first glance, your solution looks reasonable to me. I'd love to be able to look it side-by-side with what's there now to be able to reason about it more closely. If you're worried about being wrong, well, as a former technical lead of mine once told me: "oh, imposter syndrome? I wouldn't worry about that. As soon as you feel like you know what you're doing, they promote you." (h/t @numbsafari) Anyway, don't let my encouragement pressure you. I'm super thankful for all this digging you've done.
On it :)

Halo wurld

https://github.com/trufflesuite/truffle/pull/1691

Hi I was having this error on Mac:

 "before all" hook: prepare suite:
     Error: Could not find artifacts for /Users/andreamangion/workspace/blockchain/election/node_modules/openzeppelin-solidity/contracts/ownership/Ownable.sol from any sources
      at Resolver.require (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/packages/truffle-resolver/index.js:37:1)
      at TestResolver.require (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/packages/truffle-core/lib/testing/testresolver.js:23:1)
      at TestResolver.require (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/packages/truffle-core/lib/testing/testresolver.js:23:1)
      at dependency_paths.forEach.dependency_path (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/packages/truffle-core/lib/testing/soliditytest.js:203:1)
      at Array.forEach (<anonymous>)
      at deployer.deploy.then (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/packages/truffle-core/lib/testing/soliditytest.js:202:1)
      at /usr/local/lib/node_modules/truffle/build/webpack:/packages/truffle-deployer/src/deferredchain.js:20:1
      at process._tickCallback (internal/process/next_tick.js:68:7)


Does this fix such an error as well? or its only for Windows?

i have reinstalled truffle with command `npm install -g truffle`.
but there is the same error :(
OS: Windows 10
Truffle: v5.0.3
Solidity: v0.5.0
Node: v10.15.0

My question is npm only install package/truffle file without the package/truffle-compile that @Shadowstep33 PR. Then why can i still run `truffle compile`& `truffle migrate` successfully?

@vojnob not quite sure. Technicially, half of my PR **should** work for mac as far as the linking issue buttttt... not quite sure. I would check to make sure there isn't an unrelated issue in your code. Maybe post it so other can make sure?

@Chaoyuuu hmm so as far as I'm aware truffle gets compiled and built so the code for all packages should be in the cli-bundle.js file (maybe wrong name but you probs get the idea) so that's why compile and migrate work. The PR was merged but idk if trufflesuite has CI/CD so maybe it still needs to be deployed? Or maybe it's in a nightly version? Maybe try `npm i -g truffle@latest`?

We just released v5.0.4 which fixes this issue!
https://github.com/trufflesuite/truffle/releases/tag/v5.0.4
Closing this but please let us know if you have further issues.
Hi I uninstalled truffle and installed again, however I am still getting the same error.
I also had same error... solution for me was to rename solidity test file to have same name as contract inside - I had typo in file name.

In my case it can't see the Assert library e.g., 

TypeError: Member "equal" not found or not visible after argument-dependent lookup in type(library Assert).
        Assert.equal(funding.owner(), this)

Works in Truffle 0.4.x.

I had the same issue on window10 64.
solution for me was run `truffle migrate` and then run `truffle test`. It was worked for me.
